message.body: Freaking party was moved AGAIN, so I'm still in town and can go whenever you want tomorrow. Just let me know!
That has to be so annoying - you don't live close!!! I will let you know tomorrow b/c it is supposed to rain but hopefully only in the morning and there
So it looks like the weather is crappy all day :/
I could go tomorrow - i just have to be back around 2:30. Or we could do something else today?
Most of the afternoon looks like it's going to be okay today, but I could go tomorrow if you want. We could go for lunch!
It is? The weather channel app is telling me rain all afternoon. Is it lying to me?!
Ha ha. Weather.com's hourly forecast says cloudy. Nothing like consistency... Tomorrow is fine with me though, as long as that won't be too much rushing for you
Hmm weather forecasts are lame. I guess it does say isolated thunderstorms this afternoon and they do have this tent like thing so we could try this aft
ernoon. My stomach really wants lobster.
What time? I could meet you at your place. The lobster place is in clinton which is east of new haven.
Hmm... How about meeting at my place at 2? Is that too odd of a time?
